string.text: OTs-02 Kiparis

The OTs-02 Kiparis automatic mechanism is powered by a free bolt recoil. Shots are fired from closed bolt, which increases the accuracy of fire. To increase stability of the weapon, a folding stock is used, which in the compact position is folded on top of the receiver. In the Zone, this weapon is not uncommon and usually used by bandits and loners who can't afford a better weapon.\n \n

Skorpion vz.61

The Skorpion vz. 61 was developed for use by security forces, such as the Czechoslovak Army as a personal sidearm for lower-ranking army staff, vehicle drivers, armoured vehicle personnel and special forces. Currently the weapon is in use by the armed forces of several countries and criminal organizations as a sidearm. While chambered for .32 ACP, newer models made their way into the Zone chambered for 9x19mm.\n

Bandolero Upgrade Kit for PPSh-41

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]PPSh-41 
 
%c[ui_gray_1]Set of components for PPSh-41 upgrade.
 
%c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] The kit includes: the EKP-8-18 collimator sight and improved barrel casing (heat is removed faster), as a result of which it became possible to increase the rate of fire compared to the original. This upgrade is reversible.
PPSh-41 Bandolero

A major infantry weapon of the Soviet armed forces during World War II, the PPSh-41 was a durable, low-maintenance weapon made of cheap, easily-obtained components. This model is fitted with a modernized heat shield that allowed to increase fire rate even more while maintaining durability.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] The tactical kit "Bandolero" is installed on this weapon
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Integrated Axion Kobra EKP-8-18 reflex sight
Mangun's SR-2M

SR.2 "Veresk" is a Russian submachine gun (manufactured by TsNIITOCHMASH), designed to engage enemy personnel in close combat (at a distance of up to 200 m) using individual body armor. The main advantage of the SR-2 is its high firepower, high accuracy of fire and the destructive effect of a bullet at close range. This SR-2M was improved by Mangun. The improvements included: a lightweight bolt group that increases the rate of fire, a Magpul stock for better ergonomics, a picatinny rail that allows you to mount red dot/magnification sights and an LA5 laser Aim Module.\n
